DOTA Summit 13 Online: Europe & CIS

Beyond the Summit returns with DOTA Summit 13 Online, an online event featuring tournaments for Europe/CIS, Southeast Asia and the Americas.  

  • Participants
    • Eight invited teams
      • Six group stage invites
      • Two playoffs invites
    • Two teams from an open qualifier
  • Group Stage - November 2nd - November 5th, 2020
    • Two GSL groups
    • All matches are Bo3
    • Top three teams advance to the Playoffs
    • Bottom team are eliminated
  • Playoffs - November 6th - November 8th, 2020
    • Single-elimination bracket
    • Grand Final is Bo5, all other matches are Bo3

Teams

Team Liquid

Vikin.gg

mudgolems

Ninjas in Pyjamas
